Requests.acceptDescription: Accept the request to share your resume.
Requests.denyDescription: Deny request to stop sharing your resume.
Requests.receiveRequests: Receive Requests when someone clicks on your profile.
Requests.acceptRequest: When you receive a request, you can accept or deny the request When you accept the request you are sharing your resume details. You can also control the accessibility of your resume. Just by Clicking on the deny button you can stop sharing your resume information with the requester.

Prospects.mailDescription: Mail your prospect regardless of approval.
Prospects.acceptApproval: This feature gets enabled only on Approval of your request.
Prospects.viewApprovals: View your requested Resume on approval of your request
Prospects.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your propspect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

Reviews.viewApprovals: View your requested Resume on approval of your request
Reviews.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your propspect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

Appbar.title: LeetCV
Appbar.quote: Checkout the resume. Click on the url to visit on the profile.
Appbar.signOutWarningOne: Signing out will prevent you from receiving push notifications on this device.
Appbar.signOutWarningTwo: Signing out will prevent you from notifying you of requests to view your resume.

Home.description: Create a resume in under 10 minutes to get your dream job.
Home.title: Private and secure by design
Home.subTitleOne: Fully control who can access your resume. Your resume is hidden from all by default.
Home.boldParagraph: You can set it public if you are actively looking or let other request access to view your resume approaching you for a position.
Home.subTitleTwo: We value your time and we make sure you are not bothered by anyone unless you want them to.
Home.quote: We shouldn't need to pay to keep our profiles private, our data is ours.
Home.titleText: Resumes created to be reviewed efficiently
Home.secondaryParagraph: Resumes are meant to be short and precise. LeetCV gives you the tools to write and let reviewers review efficiently.
Home.alt: Resumes are meant to be short and precise. LeetCV gives you the tools to write and let reviewers review efficiently.

HomePage.description: Create a stunning resume in under 10 minutes to get your dream job get started to build resume that can land you a job rapidly.
HomePage.introHeading: Resume that is searchable and sharable. Giving you complete control over who has access
HomePage.resourcesTools: Share and receive review from your peers privately!
HomePage.resourcesParagraph: Building a resume is organic, sharing it with your peers in the industry and getting feedback to polish your resume is the best way to stay up to date with the current treads of the industry.
HomePage.sampleEmail: Enter your email address and We will give you a free trial for 7 days.
HomePage.pricingDescription: All features are free, we believe you don't need to pay to have a great resume
HomePage.pricingBudget: All features that give you privacy, collaboration and customization are free
HomePage.pricingEverything: Everything and more, unlimited access to all our features.
HomePage.testimonialsTitle: Some kind words from early customers...
HomePage.testimonialsParagraph: I worked with a small group of early access customers to make sure all of the content in the book was exactly what they needed. Hears what they had to say about the finished product.
HomePage.author: Design
HomePage.authorTitle: A single modern resume design for all industries and job levels
HomePage.authorPara: Design of our resume is influenced by thousands of resumes we have reviewed across multiple industries.
HomePage.blockquote: This method of designing icons is genius. I wish I had known this method a lot sooner.
HomePage.heading: Get lost in the world of icon design.
HomePage.paragraph: A book and video course that teaches you how to design your own icons from scratch.
HomePage.tableOfContentHeading: Get a look at all of the content covered in the book. Everything you need to know is inside.
HomePage.tableOfContentDescription: “Everything Starts as a Square” is comprised of 240 tightly edited, highly visual pages designed to teach you everything you need to know about icon design with no unnecessary filler.
HomePage.testimonialComment: How fast I got a resume ready with LeetCV was astonishing
HomePage.name: Nihar Nandan
HomePage.screencastsHeading: Build a resume that can land you a job rapidly
HomePage.screencastsDescription: Cutting edge SEO design allows your resume remains private while we allow Search engines to pick up your skills location and preference to get highlighted in searched

Stats.title: People are building their LeetCV, build yours.
Stats.paragraph: Actively updating your resume with your achievements and keep it relevant enables you to land relevant jobs.

DashboardWidget.requestTitle: People requesting to view your resume
DashboardWidget.requestDescription: A finished resume will get views and show up on searches and ensures you have completed your resume.
DashboardWidget.editorDescription: Completing the resume will sure more people can review and give feedback for your resume.
DashboardWidget.prospectsDescription: Reuqest to other profiles and get a chance to view their resume.
DashboardWidget.reviewsReceivedDesc: Reflects the total number of reviews received on your resume
DashboardWidget.pendingEducationReviewDesc: Total Education Review Pending and are yet to be resolved
DashboardWidget.approvedEducationReviewDesc: Total Education Review that are resolved
DashboardWidget.allAwardsReviewDesc: Total Number of reviews received in Awards Section
DashboardWidget.pendingAwardsReviewDesc: Total Awards Review Pending and are yet to be resolved
DashboardWidget.approvedAwardsReviewDesc: Total Awards Review Pending and are yet to be resolved
DashboardWidget.pendingDesc: Reflects the total number of reviews that are yet to be resolved on your resume
DashboardWidget.resolvedDesc: Reflects the total number of reviews that are resolved on your resume
DashboardWidget.peopleSawPortfolio: Number of people saw your portflio.
DashboardWidget.peopleSawLeetLink: Number of people saw your LeetLink
DashboardWidget.totalTrackedJobsDesc: Total jobs in your tracking list
DashboardWidget.totalMockInterviewsDesc: Total number of mock interviews you have attended
